channel.title: Error
channel.description: so when i load the webclient i get this error classnotfoundexeption client.class could someone explain how to fix this please?

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

so i can log onto my webclient.

i sent the link out to play the servers to my mates, and when they load the client it just sits at the java symbol going around in circles…

edit:

so i deleted the cache and retried on the webclient and it doesnt download the cache thats why it keeps spinning, how would i make it so it downloads the cache?
cause the jar file on my desktop downloads cache fine

[quote=“u loose, post:1, topic:524843”]so when i load the webclient i get this error
classnotfoundexeption client.class
could someone explain how to fix this please?[/quote]try deleting all your .class files, then recompile and rejar.
